availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harry B. Innes (Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Father of Catherine Innes, Hugh Innes, Gabriel S. Innes, Robert Innes, Tabitha A. Innes, Penelope Innes, and Elizabeth Innes. Married to Susan E. Hudson Innis in Franklin County on November 9, 1856. Father of Susan Innes, Ann M. Innes, Eleanor Innes, Sallie Innes, and Margaret Innes .Farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860.
